text.content: this movie checks all the marks for me. it really gets me at desire to live an actual dream for once. rolling the dice hardest as possible, leading the odd against those possibilities, going with the flow, expecting no better result (even at a point i had my hopes up), regret then no regrets, but importantly, remember everything afterward.
